GK19bahcar7u:0: saptama ucchvāsaḥ aṅganavedī vasudhā kulyā jaladhiḥ sthalī ca pātālam /
GK19bahcar7u:2: dhṛtadhanuṣi bāhuśālini śailā na namanti yattadāścaryam /
GK19bahcar7u:4_0: atha vyīteṣu ca keṣuciddivaseṣu mauhūrtikamaṇḍalena śataśaḥ sugaṇite supraśaste 'hani datte catasṛṇāmapi diśāṃ vijayayogye
GK19bahcar7u:4_1: daṇḍayātrālagne salilamokṣaviśāradaiḥ śāradairivāmbhodharaiḥ kāladhautaiḥ śātakaumbhaiśca kumbhaiḥ snātvā viracayya paramayā
GK19bahcar7u:5_0: dattvā dvijebyo ratnavanti rājatāni jātarūpamayāni ca sahasraśastilapātrāṇi kanakapatralatālaṅkṛtaśaphaśṛṅgaśikharā gāścārbudaśaḥ,
GK19bahcar7u:5_1: samupaviśya vitatavyāghracarmaṇi bhadrāsane vilipya prathamaviliptāyudho nijayaśodhavalenācaraṇataścandanena śarīraṃ,
GK19bahcar7u:6_0: paridhāya rājahaṃsamithunalakṣmaṇī sadṛśe dukūle, parameśvaracihnabhūtāṃ śaśikalāmiva kalpayitvā sitakusumamuṇḍamālikāṃ śirasi,
GK19bahcar7u:9_1: ca bhūṣaṇāni bhūbhujāṃ savibhajya, kliṣṭakārpaṭikakulaputralokamocitaiḥ prasādadānaiśca vimucya bandhanāni sakalāni, niyujya
GK19bahcar7u:10_0: bhujastambhamahamahamikayā sevakairiva sanimittairapi samagrairagrato bhavadbhiḥ pramuditaprajājanyamānajayaśabdakolāhalo
GK19bahcar7u:11: nātidūre ca nagarādupasarasvati nirmite mahati tṛṇamaye,
GK19bahcar7u:15_0: tatrasthasya cāsya grāmākṣapaṭalikaḥ sakalakaraṇiparikaraḥ “karotu devo divasagrahaṇamadyaivāvandhyaśāsanaḥ śāsanānām' ityabhidhāya
GK19bahcar7u:17: samupasthāpite ca prathamata eva mṛtpiṇḍe paribhraśya karakamalādadhomukhī mahītale papāta mudrā /
GK19bahcar7u:18: mandāśyānapaṅkapaṭale mṛdumṛdi sarasvatītīre parisphuṭaṃ vyarājanta rājayo varṇānām /
GK19bahcar7u:23: ityabhinandya manasā mahānimittaṃ tatsīrasahasrasaṃmitasīmnāṃ grāmāṇāṃ śatamadād dvijebhyaḥ
GK19bahcar7u:26: atha galati tṛtīye yāme suptasamastasanattvaniḥśabde dikkuñjarajṛmbhamāṇagambhīradhvaniratāḍhyata prayāṇapaṭahaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:27: agrataḥ sthitvā ca muhūrtamiva punaḥ prayāṇakrośasaṃkhyāpakāḥ spaṣṭamaṣṭāvadīyanta prahārāḥ paṭahe paṭīyāṃsaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:28_0: atha galati tṛtīye yāme suptasamastasattvaniḥśabde dikkuñjarajṛmbhamāṇagambhīradhvaniratāḍyata prayāṇapaṭahaḥ agrataḥ sthitvā
GK19bahcar7u:28_1: ca muhūrtamiva punaḥ prayāṇakrīśasaṃkhyāpakāḥ spaṣṭamaṣṭāvadīyanta prahārāḥ paṭahe paṭīyāṃsaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:93: udite ca bhagavati dinakṛti rājñaḥ samāyogagrahaṇasamayaśaṃsī sasvāna saṃjñāśaṅkho muhurmuhuḥ
GK19bahcar7u:94: atha na cirādiva prathamaprayāṇa eva digvijayāya diggajasamāgamamiva gamanavilolakarṇatāladolāvilāsaiḥ kurvāṇayā kareṇukayā
GK19bahcar7u:96_0: lohitāyatayā dhriyamāṇena maṅgalātapatreṇa kadalīgarbhābhyadhikamradimnā navanetranirmitena dvitīya iva bhogināmadhipatiraṅgalagnena
GK19bahcar7u:96_1: kañcukenāmṛtamathanadivasa iva kṣīrodaphenapaṭaladhavalāmbaravāhī, bāla eva pārijātapādapa ivākhaṇḍalabhūmimārūḍhaḥ,
GK19bahcar7u:97_1: savitāramapi pibanniva tejasā bahalatāmbūlasindūracchuritayā vilabhamāna iva dvīpāntarāṇyoṣṭhamudrayānurāgasya sphuranmahāhāramarīcicakravālāni
GK19bahcar7u:98: cāmarāṇīva diśo 'pi grāhayan, rājakekṣaṇotkṣiptatribhāgayā trīnapi lokān
GK19bahcar7u:99_0: karadānāyājñāpayanniva savibhramaṃ bhrūlatayā drāghīyasā bāhuprākāreṇa parikṣipanniva rirakṣayā saptāpi sāgaramahākhātānakhilamiva
GK19bahcar7u:99_1: kṣorodamādhuryamādāyodgatayā lakṣmyā samupagūḍhaḥ, gāḍhamamṛtamaya iva pīyamānaḥ kutūhalottānakaṭakalokalocanasahasraaiḥ
GK19bahcar7u:99_2: snehārdreṣu rājñāṃ hṛdayeṣu guṇagauraveṇa majjanniva, limpannivasaubhāgyadraveṇa
GK19bahcar7u:102: puraḥsarairālokakārakaiḥ sahasrasaṃkhyairarka iva kiraṇairadhikāracāturyacañcalacaraṇairvyavasthāsthāpananiṣṭhuraiḥ bhayapalāyamānalokotpīḍāntaritā dasāpi diśo grāhayadbhiriva,
GK19bahcar7u:109: vilulitakusumaśekhararajasi rājacakre, prabhāmucāṃ cūḍāmaṇīnāmavāñcastiryañca udañcaśca cañcanto marīcayaścāparāśaya iva
GK19bahcar7u:111: meghāyamānareṇumeduraṃ mandiraśikhaṇḍina iva khamuḍḍīyamānāḥ komalakalpapādapapallavavandanamālāḥ kalāpā ivābadhyanta digdvāreṣu dikpālaiḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:112_1: pratipraṇāmaiśconmattabhrūvīkṣitaiścājñādānaiścākrīṇanniva mānamayān prāṇān praṇayadānaiḥ pravīrāṇāṃ vīro yathānurūpaṃ vibabhāja
GK19bahcar7u:113: atha prasthite rājani bahalakalakalatrastadiṅnāgaśūtkārarava ivetastatastastāra tāratarastūryāṇāṃ pratidhvanirāśātaṭeṣu /
GK19bahcar7u:114: diggajebhyaḥ prakupitānāṃ triprasrutānāṃ kariṇāṃ madaprasravaṇavīthībhiralikulakālībhiḥ kālindīveṇikāsahasrāṇīva
GK19bahcar7u:122: aripratāpānalanirmūlanāyeva madoṣmaśīkaraiḥ śiśekire kariṇaḥ kakubhāṃ cakram /
GK19bahcar7u:130: bhadra, bhagnacaraṇa iva saṃcarasiyāvadamī puraḥsarāḥ sarabhasamupari patanti /
GK19bahcar7u:131: vāhayasi kimuṣṭram? na paśyasi nirdaya, niḥśūkaśiśukaṃ śayānam? vatsa
GK19bahcar7u:132: rāmila, rajasi yathā na nasyasi tathā samīpe bhava, kiṃ na paśyasi galati
GK19bahcar7u:134: saurabheya, saraṇimapahāya hayamadhyaṃ dhāvasi? dhīvari, viśasi, gantukāmā
GK19bahcar7u:143: kimadyaiva vidrāsi droṇaka, drāghīyasī daṇḍayātrā, vinaikena niṣṭhurakeṇa niṣkreyamasmākam
GK19bahcar7u:144: agrataḥ panthāḥ sthapuṭaka, sthāvara, yathā na bhanakṣi phaṇitasthālīṃ,
GK19bahcar7u:153: hata hastipaka, nedīyasi karikaradaṇḍe samadaḥsaṃmardakardame skhalasi /
GK19bahcar7u:155: ita ehi māṇavaka, ghanebhaghaṭāsaṃghaṭṭasaṃkaṭe nāsti nistaraṇasaraṇiḥ' /
GK19bahcar7u:157: stūyamānam, vkavidasahāyaiḥ kleśārjitakugrāmakuṭumbisaṃpāditasīdatsaurabheyaśambalasaṃvāhanāyāsāvegāgatasaṃyogaiḥ svayaṃ gṛhītagṛhopaskaraṇaiḥ “iyamekā kathañciddaṇḍayātrā yātu /
GK19bahcar7u:165: phalakāle 'nya eva viṭāḥ samupasthāsyante' iti mukharaiḥ pade pade patatāṃ durbalabalīvardānāṃ niyuktaiḥ skhalane khalaceṭakeḥ
GK19bahcar7u:173_1: paritāpatyājitabhayaiḥ “vka rājā, kuto rājā? ko dṛśo vā rājā?' iti
GK19bahcar7u:184_0: anekavṛttāntatayā kautukajananam, pralayajaladhimiva jagadgrāsagrahaṇāya pravṛttam, pātālamiva mahrābhogināṃ guptaye samutpāditam,
GK19bahcar7u:184_1: kailāsamiva parameśvaravasataye sṛṣṭam, dṛsyamānasakalaprāṇiparyāyaṃ caturyugasargakośamiva prajāpatīnāṃ kleśabahulamapi
GK19bahcar7u:184_2: tapaḥkaraṇamitra kramakāriṇaṃ kalyāṇānām, evaṃ ca vīkṣyamāṇaḥ kaṭakaṃ jagāṃma /
GK19bahcar7u:185: āsannavartināṃ ca “tatrabhavatā māndhātrā pravartitāḥ panthāno digvijayāya
GK19bahcar7u:186: apratihataratharaṃhasā raghuṇā laghunaiva kālenākāri kakubhāṃ prasādanam /
GK19bahcar7u:190: sahimahimavadvyavahito 'pyuvāha bāhubalavyatikarakātaraḥ karaṃ kauraveśvarasya kiṅkara ivākṛtī drumaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:191: nātijigīṣavaḥ khalu pūrve yenālpa eva bhūbhāge bhūyāṃso bhagadattadantavakrakrāthakarṇakau ravaśiśupālasālvajarāsaṃdhasindhurājaprabhṛtayo 'bhavan bhūpatayaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:192: saṃtuṣṭo rājā yudhiṣṭhiro yo hyasahata samīpa eva dhanañjayajayajanitajagatkampaḥ kiṃpuruṣāṇāṃ rājyam /
GK19bahcar7u:193: alasaścaṇḍakośo yo na prāvikṣat kṣmāṃ jitvā strīrājyam /
GK19bahcar7u:200: dakṣiṇārṇavakallolānilacalitacandanalatāsaurabhasundarīkṛtadarīmand irāddardurādadrernedīyasi malayo malayalagna eva ca mahendraḥ' /
GK19bahcar7u:202: mandiradvāri cobhayataḥ sabahumānaṃ brūlatābhyāṃ visarjitarājalokaḥ praviśya cāvatatāra bāhyāsthānamaṇḍapasthāpitamāsanamācakrāma
GK19bahcar7u:205: vijñāpitavān--”deva! prāgjyotiṣeśvareṇa kumāreṇa prahito haṃsaveganāmā dūto 'ntaraṅgastoraṇamadhyāste' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:207: atha dakṣatayā kṣitipālādarācca pratīhāraḥ svayameva niragāt /
GK19bahcar7u:208_0: anantaraṃ ca haṃsavegaḥ savinayamākṛtyaiva nayanānandasaṃpādanasubhagābhogabhadratayā samullaṅghyamānaguṇagarimā prabhūtaprābhṛtabhṛtāṃ
GK19bahcar7u:211: pādapīṭhaluṭhitalalāṭalekho nyastahastaḥ pṛṣṭhe pārthivenopasṛtya bhūyo namaścakre /
GK19bahcar7u:213: tato rājā tiraścīṃ tanumīṣadiva dadhānaścāmaragrāhiṇīmantarālavartinīṃ samutsārya saṃmukhīnastaṃ sapraśrayaṃ papraccha--”haṃsavega!
GK19bahcar7u:215: sa tamanvavādīt--”adya kuśalī yenaivaṃ snehasnapitayā sauhārdadravārdrayā sagauravaṃ girā pṛcchati devaḥ' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:216_0: sthitvā ca muhūrttamiva punaḥ sa caturamuvāca--”caturambhodhibhogabhūtibhājanabhūtasya devasya sadbhāvagarbhamapahāya hṛdayamekamanyadanurūpaṃ
GK19bahcar7u:216_1: prābhṛtameva durlabhaṃ loke tathāpyasmatsvāminā saṃdeśamaśūnyatāṃ nayatā pūrvajopārjitaṃ vāruṇātapatramābhogākhyamanurūpasthānanyāsena
GK19bahcar7u:220: yasminpraviṣṭe pradhyānānantaraṃ svādavo dantavīṇopadeśācāryāścyotanticandrabhāsāmambhasāṃ maṇiśalākābhyo yāvadicchamacchā dhārāḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:221: pracetā iva yaścaturṇāmarṇavānāmadhipatirbhūto bhāvī vā tamidamanugṛhṇāti cchāyayā netaram
GK19bahcar7u:222: idaṃ ca na saptārcirdahati, na pṛṣadaśvo harati, nodakamārdrayati, na rajāṃsi malinayanti, na jarā jarjarayatīti /
GK19bahcar7u:223: etattāvadanugṛhṇātu dṛśā devaḥ saṃdeśamapi visrabdhaṃ śroṣyati' /
GK19bahcar7u:226: sa ca vacanānantaramutthāya pumānūrdhvīcakāra taddhautadukūlakalpitācca nicolakādakoṣīt /
GK19bahcar7u:227: ākṛṣyamāṇa eva ca yasminnatisitamahasi sarabhasamahāsīva hareṇa,
GK19bahcar7u:228: rasātalādudalāsīva śeṣaphaṇiphaṇāphalakamaṇḍalena, asthāyīva cakrībhūyāntarikṣe kṣīrodena, aghaṭīva gaganāṅgane gīṣṭhībandhaḥ śāradena
GK19bahcar7u:230_0: pātāmahavimānahaṃsayūthena, atrinetranirgatasya dhavaladhāmamaṇḍalamanoharo dṛṣṭa iva janena janmadivasaḥ kumudabandhoḥ pratyakṣīkṛta
GK19bahcar7u:231: kīmudīpradoṣadarśanānandatṛptirakṣṇām, udamāṅkṣīdiva mandākinīpulinamaṇḍalaṃ mahadambarodare, parivartita iva divasaḥ
GK19bahcar7u:236: citrīyamāṇacetāśca sarājako rājā daṇḍānusārādhirohiṇyā dṛṣṭyā sādaramaikṣiṣṭa tattiṃlakamiva tribhuvanasya, śaiśavamiva śvetadvīpasya,
GK19bahcar7u:237: aṃśāvatāramiva śaradindoḥ, hṛdayamiva dharmasya, niveśamiva śaśilokasya,
GK19bahcar7u:243_1: lakṣmaṇā vitatapatreṇa haṃsena sanāthīkṛtaśikharam, sparśavatā ca prabhāvastambhitena
GK19bahcar7u:244: mandākinīmṛṇālena mukulitaphaṇena vāsukineva nītena daṇḍatāṃ dyotamānam,
GK19bahcar7u:245: dhavalimnā kṣālayadiva nakṣatrapatham, prabāpravāhaprathimnā prāvṛṇvadiva divasam, samucchrāyeṇādhaḥkurvadiva divam, uparisthitamiva
GK19bahcar7u:248: khaḍgadhārājalānām, yaśaḥ paṭalamiva śauryaśālitāyāḥ, trailaukyādbhutaṃ mahacchatram /
GK19bahcar7u:249: dṛṣṭe tasmin rājñā prathame śeṣamapi prābhṛtaṃ prakāśayāñcakruḥ krameṇa kārmāḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:253_0: hārān, anekarāgaruciravetrakaraṇḍakuṇḍalīkṛtāni śaraccandramarīciruñci śaucakṣamāṇi kṣaumāṇi, kuśalaśilpilokollikhitānāṃ
GK19bahcar7u:253_1: ca śuktiśaṅkhagalvarkapramukhānāṃ pānabājanānāṃ nicayān, nicolakarakṣitarucāṃ ca rucirakāñcanapatrabhaṅgabhaṅgurāṇāmatibandhurapariveśānāṃ
GK19bahcar7u:257_0: pariṇatapāṭalapaṭolatviṃṣi ca taruṇahārītaharinti kṣīrakṣārīṇi ca pūgānāṃ pallavavalambīni sarasāni phalāni, sahakāralatārakānāṃ
GK19bahcar7u:259: tuṣāraśilāśakalaśiśirasvacchasitasya ca karpūrasya, kastūrikākośakānāṃ ca pakkaphalajūṭajaṭilānāṃ ca kakkolapallavānām, lavaṅgapuṣpamañjarīṇāṃ jātīphalastabakānāṃ ca rāśīn,
GK19bahcar7u:261_0: likhitānekalekhyaphalakasaṃpuṭān, kutūhalakṛnti ca kanakaśṛṅkhalāniyamitagrīvāṇāṃ kiṃnnarāṇāṃ ca vanamānuṣāṇāṃ ca jīvañjīvakānāṃ
GK19bahcar7u:264: rājā tu chatradarśanātprahṛṣṭahṛdayaḥ prathamaprayāṇe śobhananimitamiti manasā jagrāha /
GK19bahcar7u:265: haṃsavegaṃ ca prīyamāṇo babhāṣe--”bhadra! sakalaratnadhāmnaḥ paramesvaraśirodhāraṇārhasyāsya mahātapatrasya mahārṇavādiva kumudabāndhavasya kumārāllābho na vismāya /
GK19bahcar7u:269: svayamapyutthāya snātvā maḍgalākāṅkṣī prāṅmukhaḥ prāviśadābhogasya chāyām
GK19bahcar7u:270_0: atha viśata evāsya chāyājanmanā jaḍimnā cūḍhāmaṇitāmanīyateva śaśibimbamambubindumucaścucumburiva candrakāntamaṇayo lalāṭataṭaṃ
GK19bahcar7u:270_1: karpūrareṇava iva vyalīyanta locanayūgale gale galattuhinakaṇanikarakṛtanīhārā hārā ivāvabadhyanta haricandanarasāsāreṇevāpāti
GK19bahcar7u:272_0: āhārakāle ca hasavegāya dhavalakarpaṭaprāvṛtadhautanālikeraparigṛhītaṃ viliptaśeṣaṃ candanamahgaspṛṣṭe ca vāsasī śarattārakākāratāramuktāstabakitapadaṃ
GK19bahcar7u:272_1: pariveśaṃ nāma kaṭisūtrakam atimahārhapajharāgālokalohitīkṛtadivasaṃ ca taraṅgakaṃ nāma karṇābharaṇaṃ prabūtaṃ ca bhojyajātaṃ
GK19bahcar7u:276: mukulāyamānasakalakamalavanā pramukha eva baddhasevāñjalipuṭeva sadvīpā bhūrabhūd bhūpateḥ
GK19bahcar7u:283: prayāṇavārtā iva māninīnāṃ hṛdayabhedinyo yayurindudīdhitayo daśa diśaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:285: cinteva bhūbhṛtāṃ hṛdayāni viveśa guhāvivarāṇi vimuktasarvāśātimirasaṃtatiḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:287: asyāṃ ca velāyāṃ vitatavitānatalavartī narendro “yāta tāvat' iti visarjyānujīvino haṃsavegamādiṣṭavān--”kathaya saṃdeśam' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:288: praṇamya sa kathayituṃ prāstāvīt--”deva! purā mahāvarāhasaṃparkasaṃbhūtagarbhayā bhagavatyā bhuvā narako nāma sūnurasāvi rasātale /
GK19bahcar7u:293_0: mahātmanastasyānvaye bhagadattapuṣpadattavajradattaprabhṛtiṣu vyatīteṣu bahuṣu merūpameṣu mahatsu mahīpāleṣu pramautro mahārājabhūtivarmaṇaḥ
GK19bahcar7u:293_1: pautraścandramukhavarmaṇaḥ putro devasya kailāsasthirasthiteḥ sthitivarmaṇaḥ susthiravarmā nāma mahārājādhirājo jajñe tejasāṃ
GK19bahcar7u:295: yaśca bāla eva prītyā dvijātīnaprītyā cārātīnsamagrānpratigrahānagrāhayat
GK19bahcar7u:297: tathā ca yo vāhinīnāthānāṃ śaṅkhāñjahāra na ratnāni, pṛthivyāḥ sthairyaṃ jagrāha na karam, avanibhṛtāṃ gauravamādatta na naiṣṭhuryam /
GK19bahcar7u:298: tasya ca sugṛhītanāmno devasya devyāṃ śyāmādevyāṃ bhāskaradyutirbhāskaravarmāparanāmā tanayaḥ saṃtanorbāgīrathyāṃ bhīṣma iva kumāraḥ samabhavat /
GK19bahcar7u:299_0: ayamasya ca śaiśavādārabya saṃkalpaḥ stheyānsthāṇupādāravindadvayādṛte nāhamanyaṃ namaskuryāmitir idṛśaścāyaṃ manorathastribhuvanadurlabhastrayāṇāmanyatamena
GK19bahcar7u:299_1: saṃpadyate sakalabuvanavijayena vā mṛtyunā vā yadi vā
GK19bahcar7u:303: devasya hi yaśāṃsi sañcicīṣato bahiraṅgabhūtāni dhanāni /
GK19bahcar7u:304: bāhāveva ca kevale niṣaṇṇasya śeṣāvayavānāmapi sāhāyakasaṃpādanamanoratho niravakāśaḥ kimuta bāhyajanasya /
GK19bahcar7u:309: prāgjyotiṣesvaro hi devena sahaikapiṅga ivānahgadviṣā, daśaratha iva gotrabhidā, dhanañjaya iva puṣkarākṣeṇa, vakartana iva duryodhanena,
GK19bahcar7u:311_0: yadi ca devasyāpi maitrīyati hṛdayamavagacchati ca paryāyāntaritaṃ dāsyamanutiṣṭhanti suhṛda iti tataḥ kimāsyate samājñāpyatāmanubhavatu
GK19bahcar7u:313: nābhinandati ceddevaḥ praṇayamājñāpayatu kiṃ kathanīyaṃ mayā svāmina' iti
GK19bahcar7u:314_0: viratavacasi tasminbhūpālaḥ pūrvopalabdhaireva gurubhirguṇairāropitabahumānaḥ kumāre sudūramābhogātapatravyatikareṇa tu parāṃ
GK19bahcar7u:314_1: koṭimāropite premṇi lajjamāna iva sādaraṃ jagāda--”haṃsavega!
GK19bahcar7u:315: kathamiva tādṛśi mahātmani mahābhijane puṇyarāśau guṇīnāṃ prāgrahare parokṣasuhṛdi snihyati madvidhasyānyathā svapne 'pi pravarteta manaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:316: sakalajagaduttāpanapaṭavo 'pi śiśirāyante tribuvananayanānandakare kamalākare karāstigmatejasaḥ. subahuguṇakrītāsca ke vayaṃ sakhyasya /
GK19bahcar7u:319: śreyāṃśca saṃkalpaḥ kumārasya svayaṃ bāhuśālī mayi ca samālambitaśarāsane suhṛdi harādṛte kamanyaṃ namasyati /
GK19bahcar7u:321: avalepini paśāvapi kesariṇi bahumāno hṛdayasya kiṃ punaḥ suhṛdi /
GK19bahcar7u:322: tattathā yateṣāḥ yathā na ciramiyamasmānkleśayati kumāradarśanotkaṇṭhā' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:325: sevābhīravo hi santaḥ, tatrāpi viśeṣeṇāyamahaṅkāradhano vaiṣṇavo vaṃśaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:327: paśyatu devaḥ puruṣasya hi sevāṃ prati durjananyevātivṛddhayā durgatyā vābhimukhīkriyamāṇasya, kuṭumbinyevāsaṃtuṣṭayā tṛṣṇayā vā preryamāṇasya,
GK19bahcar7u:330: jaratkumārīmiva paramārgaṇayogyāmatimahatīṃ vā avasthāṃ paśyataḥ, stagṛhe durbandhubhiriva duḥsthitaiḥ samagrairgrahairvā grāhyamāṇasyābhiyogaṃ,
GK19bahcar7u:332_0: sakalaśarīrasaṃtāpakaraṃ karīṣāgnimiva duṣkṛtinaḥ kṛtacittsya saṃpraveṣṭuṃ rājakulamupahatasakalendriyaśakteriva mithyaiva
GK19bahcar7u:332_1: hṛdayagataviṣayagrāmagrahaṇābhilāṣasya, prathamameva toraṇatale vantanamālākisalayasyeva śuṣyato dvārarakṣibhirniruddhasya,
GK19bahcar7u:332_2: pīḍitasya praviśato dvāre hariṇasyevāparairhanyamānasya, karikarmacarmapuṭasyeva muhurmuhuḥ pratihāramaṇḍalakaraprahārairnirasyamānasya,
GK19bahcar7u:341: sukhavāhyamātmānaṃ vidadhānasya, anaśanaśāyina iva hṛdayasthāpitajīvanāśasya, śarīraṃ kṣapayataḥ śuna iva
GK19bahcar7u:343: pretasyevānucitabhūmidīyamānānnapiṇḍasya, balibhuja iva jihvālaulyopayuktapuruṣavarcaso vṛthā vihitāyuṣo jīvitaḥ,
GK19bahcar7u:344_1: rājaśukālāpaiḥ śiśoriva mugdhavilobhyamānasya, vetālasyeva narendraprabhāvāviṣṭasya na
GK19bahcar7u:346: nirmālyavāhinaḥ, kaphavikāriṇa iva dine dine kaṭukairudvejyamānasya,
GK19bahcar7u:349: kuśayanacanitasamadhikataraduḥkhavṛtteḥ, tulāyantrasyeva paścātkṛtagauravasya toyārthamapi namataḥ, atikṛpaṇasya śirasā kevalenāsaṃtuṣṭasya vacasāpi pādau spṛśataḥ,
GK19bahcar7u:353: kleśānupārjayataḥ. svavṛddhibuddhyāvamānaṃ saṃvardhayato mūḍhasya, satyapi vividhakusumādhivāsasurabhiṇi vane tṛṣṇāyāñjalimuparacayataḥ,
GK19bahcar7u:356: vedheyasyevāpaśabdamukhasya, śaktimato 'pi śvitriṇa iva saṃkocitakarayugalasya, samasamutkarṣeṣu
GK19bahcar7u:358: duḥkhānilenānirvṛterjvalataḥ, bhaktasyāpyabhaktasya, nirūṣmaṇaḥ saṣantāpayato bandhūn, vimānasyāpyagatikasya,
GK19bahcar7u:361: śayyotthāyaṃ praṇamato dagdhamuṇḍasya, gotravidūṣakasya naktandinaṃ nṛtyato manasvijanaṃ hāsayataḥ, kulāhgārasya vaṃśaṃ dahataḥ, nṛpaśostṛṇe
GK19bahcar7u:362: 'pi labde kandharāmavanamayataḥ, jaṭharaparipūraṇamātraprayojanajanmano māṃsapiṇḍasya garbharogasyamātuḥ, apuṇyānāṃ kamaṇāmācaraṇād bhṛtakasya kiṃ
GK19bahcar7u:363: prāyaścittam, kā pratipattikriyā, vka gatasya śāntiḥ, kīdṛśaṃ jīvitam, kaḥ
GK19bahcar7u:364_0: puruṣābhimānaḥ, kiṃnāmāno vilāsāḥ, kīdṛśo bhogaśraddhā, prabalapaṅka iva sarvamadhastānnayati dāruṇo dāsaśabdaḥ dhiktaducchvasitamupayātu
GK19bahcar7u:364_1: nidhanaṃ dhanam, abhavanirbhūterastu tasyā namo bhagavadbhyastebhyaḥ sukhebhyastasyāyamañjaliraiśvaryasya tiṣṭhatu dūra eva
GK19bahcar7u:365_0: paricchadaḥ karotu yadarthamuttamāṅgaṃ gā gamiṣyatyaśāpānugrahakṣamastapasvī mukhapriyarataḥ klībo pūtimāṃsamayaḥ kṛmiragaṇyamāno
GK19bahcar7u:367: kroḍakaṣaṇeṣu, śvā nīcacāṭukaraṇeṣu, kṛkalāsaḥ śiroviḍambanāsu, jāhaka
GK19bahcar7u:370: vīṇādaṇḍaḥ koṇābighāteṣu, varākaḥ sevako 'pi martyamadhye rājilo 'pi vā
GK19bahcar7u:371: bhogī, pulāko 'pi vā kalamo, varaṃ kṣaṇamapi kṛtā mānavatā mānavatā na
GK19bahcar7u:374: prāgjyotiṣeśvara iti karotu cetasi' ityuktvā tūṣṇīmabhūt /
GK19bahcar7u:378: prabāte ca prabhūtaṃ pratiprābhṛtaṃ pradhānapratidūtādhiṣṭhitaṃ dattvā haṃsavegaṃ prāhiṇot
GK19bahcar7u:380: kadācittu rājyavardhanabhujabalopārjitamaśeṣaṃ mālavarājasādhanamādāyāgataṃ samīpa evāvāsitaṃ lekhahārakādbhaṇḍimaśṛṇot /
GK19bahcar7u:382_0: atha bhaṇḍirekenaiva vājinā katipayakulaputraparivṛto malinavāsā ripuśaraśalyapūritena nikhātabahulohakīlakaparikararakṣitasphuṭaneneva
GK19bahcar7u:385: drohīva, muṣita iva, chalita iva, yūthapatipatanaviṣaṇṇa iva vegadaṇḍavāraṇaḥ, sūryāstamayaniḥśrīka iva kamalākaraḥ,
GK19bahcar7u:386: duryodhananidhanadurmanā iva drauṇiḥ, apahṛtaratna iva sāgaro
GK19bahcar7u:390: avanipatirapi dṛṣṭvā tamutthāya praviralaiḥ padaiḥ pratyudgamyotthāpya ca gāḍhamupagūhya kaṇṭhe karuṇamaticiraṃ ruroda /
GK19bahcar7u:396_0: sa punaravādīt--”deva! deva bhūyaṃ gate deve rājyavardhane guptanāmnā ca gṛhīte kuśasthale devī rājyaśrīḥ paribhraśya bandhanādvindhyāṭavīṃ
GK19bahcar7u:396_1: saparivārā praviṣṭeti lokato vārtāmaśṛṇavam anveṣṭārastu tāṃ prati prabhūtāḥ prahitā janā nādyāpi nivartante' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:402: śārīrikavasanakusumāṅgarāgālaṅkārapreṣaṇaprakaṭitaprasādeva bhaṇḍinā sārdhamabhukta, nināya ca tenaiva saha vāsaram /
GK19bahcar7u:403: athāparedyuruṣasyeva bhaṇḍirbhūpālamupasṛtya vyajñāpayat--”paśyatu devaḥ śrīrājyavardhanabhujabalārjitaṃ sādhanaṃ saparibarhaṃ mālavarājasya' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:416: athālocya tatsarvamavanipālaḥ svīkartuṃ yathādhikāramādiśadadhyakṣān anyasmiṃścāhani hayaireva svasāramanveṣṭumuccacāla vindhyāṭavīmavāpa ca parimitaireva prayāṇakaistām /
GK19bahcar7u:446_1: puriṇatacakravākakaṇṭhakaṣāyarucāṃ śīdhavyānāṃ valkalānāṃ kalāpān, nāticiroddhṛtānāṃ ca dhātutviṣāṃ dhātakīkusumānāṃ goṇīragaṇitāḥ
GK19bahcar7u:447_1: kuṣṭhasya kaṭhorakesarisaṭābhārababhruṇaśca rodhrasya bhūyaso bhārakān, lokenādāya vrajatā pravicitavividhavanaphalapūritapiṭakamastakābhiścābhyarṇagrāmagatvarībhistvaramāṇābhirvikrayacintāvyagrābhirgrāmeyakābhirvyāptadigantaramitastataśca
GK19bahcar7u:466: iti śrīmahākavibāṇabhaṭṭakṛtau harṣacarite chatralabdhirnāma saptama ucchvāsa
